[[inst_hl_prf_a]]
==== HL.PRF.A

*Syntax:* hl.prf.a{.l1,.l2,.l3} [SrcL, SrcR<{.sw,.uw}><<<shamt>], ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Prefetch instruction for cache hint. Provides a hint to the processor that the specified memory location is likely to be accessed soon.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_prf_a.svg[HL.PRF.A encoding,width=800]

*Group:* LDA
